SEARCH
Package com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Repository

Interface RecipeRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Recipe,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Recipe,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Recipe,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Recipe,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Recipe,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Recipe>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Recipe,UUID>, SlugableReposetory<Recipe>
public interface RecipeRepository extends SlugableReposetory<Recipe>
Spring Data JPA repository for Recipe entities. Provides standard CRUD operations inherited from JpaRepository, along with custom query methods to find recipes by their output or the name of their output. This repository plays a crucial role in managing the data access layer for recipe entities, facilitating the retrieval of recipes based on specific criteria related to the product they generate.

  • Method Details

    • findByOutputIs

      Optional<Recipe> findByOutputIs(Good output)
      Finds a recipe by its output good.
      Parameters:
      output - The output Good of the recipe to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the recipe if a matching output is found; otherwise, an empty Optional.

    • findByOutputIdIs

      Optional<Recipe> findByOutputIdIs(UUID id)
      Finds a recipe by its output good's ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the output Good of the recipe to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the recipe if a matching output ID is found; otherwise, an empty Optional.
